name: The Turing-Drag Test: Demonstration of the effectiveness of the Turing test by the impossibility of its success.
description:
NFTs are too tangible for a thought experiment. For u2p050, the
purchase of this NFT does not only grant ownership of a digital .PDF
file - that would be too simple. It is the thought experiment to which
these few words refer that constitutes the artwork itself.

2021
